name: Leonice BARTLETT v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (THE CHRISTIAN ACADEMY), Petition of The Christian Academy
name_abbreviation: Bartlett v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Leonice BARTLETT v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (THE CHRISTIAN ACADEMY), Petition of The Christian Academy.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of December 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. This matter is REMANDED to the Workers’ Compensation Judge for further proceedings consistent with the Commonwealth Court’s decision.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
811 A.2d 1009
Leonice BARTLETT v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (THE CHRISTIAN ACADEMY), Petition of The Christian Academy.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 4, 2002.
